short_summary: The Senate of Canada (Senate) is seeking to establish a contract for professional services to guide the Senate of Canada’s goal of achieving Net Zero Emissions/Carbon Footprint by 2030 as defined in Annex “A” - Statement of Work, for a period of 4 months from signature of contract for Phase 1 with the option to renew for up to two (2) additional phases.
description: This project aims to achieve Net Zero Emissions/Carbon Footprint by 2030 and requires the services of a professional to guide the Senate of Canada’s goal.
